Class ChangeComputation

java.lang.Object
ChangeComputation
public class ChangeComputation extends Object
This class simulates a cash register with the capability to process USD in a foreign country that uses Euros. It receives the amount of each USD involved in purchasing an item. It then calculates the correct amount of change in Euros and displays the amount of each Euro currency to return. BigDecimal is used extensively to maintain precision while working with currency . The executable file is ChangeComputation test.
Since:
09/29/23
See Also:
  • JUnit testing is also provided.

  • Field Details

    • exchangeRate

      private static final BigDecimal exchangeRate
      The exchange rate for converting USD to Euros. As of 09/29/23, the exchange rate is 0.9446.

    • usdCurrency

      private static final String[] usdCurrency
      An array representing various USD currencies. Formatted to accommodate BigDecimal.

    • euroCurrency

      private static final String[] euroCurrency
      An array representing various Euro currencies. Formatted to accommodate BigDecimal.

    • descendingComparator

      private static final Comparator<BigDecimal> descendingComparator
      A descending comparator used for sorting currency values in descending order.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChangeComputation

      public ChangeComputation()
      Constructs a ChangeComputation object where the cash register simulation takes place. If the user does not put in enough money the first time, the simulation will keep repeating until the balance is paid. Invalid user input has not been accounted for.

  • Method Details

    • getUsdCurrency

      public static String[] getUsdCurrency()
      Retrieves the array of USD currencies.
      Returns:
      The array of USD currencies.

    • getEuroCurrency

      public static String[] getEuroCurrency()
      Retrieves the array of Euro currencies.
      Returns:
      The array of Euro currencies.

      public static Comparator<BigDecimal> getDescendingComparator()
      Retrieves the comparator to sort currencies in descending order.
      Returns:

    • usdToEuros

      public static BigDecimal usdToEuros(BigDecimal usd)
      Converts USD currency to Euro currency.
      Parameters:
      usd - Value of USD currency.
      Returns:
      Value of USD currency in Euros. Rounded to 2 decimal places.

    • eurosToUSD

      public static BigDecimal eurosToUSD(BigDecimal euros)
      Converts Euro currency to USD currency.
      Parameters:
      euros - Value of Euro currency.
      Returns:
      Value of Euro currency in USD. Rounded to 2 decimal places.

    • moneyInput

      public static Integer[] moneyInput(Scanner scanner, TreeMap<BigDecimal,Integer> itemizedUSD)
      Prompts the user to enter the amount of each USD currency paid to the cash register. Dynamically tracks and updates this information in Treemap itemizedUSD.
      Parameters:
      scanner - Scanner object to keep track of user input.
      itemizedUSD - TreeMap to store USD currencies and their respective amounts.
      Returns:
      An array of each USD currency amount for easy JUnit testing.

    • paidInUSD

      public static BigDecimal paidInUSD(TreeMap<BigDecimal,Integer> itemizedUSD)
      Sums up all the paid USD currency.
      Parameters:
      itemizedUSD - TreeMap to store USD currencies and their respective amounts.
      Returns:
      Value of paid USD currency. Rounded to 2 decimal places.

    • changeInEuros

      public static BigDecimal changeInEuros(BigDecimal balanceInEuros, BigDecimal paidInUSD)
      Calculates the change in Euros to return to the user.
      Parameters:
      balanceInEuros - The original price of the item in Euros.
      paidInUSD - Value of total amount paid in USD.
      Returns:
      Value of the change in Euros.

    • moneyOutput

      public static Integer[] moneyOutput(TreeMap<BigDecimal,Integer> itemizedEuros, BigDecimal changeInEuros)
      This method gives an itemized list of the amount of each Euro currency to return in change to the user.
      Parameters:
      itemizedEuros - Treemap to store Euro currencies and their respective amounts.
      changeInEuros - Value of the change in Euros.
      Returns:
      An array of each Euro currency amount for easy JUnit testing.
